sentences: Lee Ji-hyun (Korean: 이지현; born December 12, 1986), better known by her stage name Qri, is a South Korean singer and actress.
Lee Ji-hyun was born on December 12, 1986.
In July 2013, Qri became the new leader of T-ara under the group's rotating leadership system.
In September 2009, Qri made her acting debut in the drama Queen Seondeok as Kim Yu-shin's wife.
She made a cameo appearance alongside other members of T-ara in the drama Master of Study in 2010, and was then given a lead role on KBS's drama Southern Trader Kim Chul Soo's Update.
She was cast alongside groupmate Eunjung for KBS' drama King Geunchogo in 2011, starting from episode 47.
